attributes.review: i don’t understand why this app takes DAYS to download, it’s also very slow and glitchy not very good. i don’t recommend this app at all . it’s really disturbing and once it installs after DAYS, it takes up much storage from your phone and it’s just not a good app , definitely don’t recommend 😢.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER 💋

attributes.review: Hacked my phone to get all of my data, had to get a new phone to be able to write this review. i am outraged at the amount of steps i had to go through to be able to download the app. it took months to download 😡 apple please delete the app!!! it’s not worth anyone’s time or money
attributes.title: worst app ever known to man

attributes.review: This took three years to download 😤 i wanted to find evidence to prove those who said he’s racist, homophobic, a pedaphile (and so much more) wrong. but I couldn’t find the information 😡 this also caused me to only see things in the color blue, and it feeds my sleep paralysis demon. very upset
attributes.title: if I could give it zero stars I would

attributes.review: I would never download this app ever again, I downloaded this spot thinking that I would get a bunch of free coupons for McDonalds. You know- since Donald Trump seems to eat there so much? And I'm disappointed that there were no expected coupons. Extremely disappointing in the app. 😤😤😡
attributes.title: Absolute Trash

attributes.review: 🤮. That’s it 🤮. I shouldn’t have to say more 🤮. But I will 😊. The fact that you would even think of downloading this app other than to give it a bad rating is nasty. Take a look in the mirror if you support him and realize you are supporting a homophobic, a racist, a sexist...the list goes on. Anyways back to the point...🤮
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: Not only did this app take 2 days to download, but a girl came out of the screen saying I have 7 days... anyways John Cena chock slammed me and that girl then stomped on us BA BA NA NAAAAAA but seriously this app has given me diarrhea ad constipation
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: As soon as you click download it asks for your social security number, ID number, mothers maiden name, and first pet that you owned. THEN, it accesses your contacts and sends racist and homophobic texts to all your family and friends! The worse WORSE part, You have to hit Biden’s head into a goal and I get get higher than 3 goals 😭
attributes.title: WORSE APP SINCE FLAPPY BIRD

attributes.review:
Once I downloaded this I expected something very professional but our “beloved” president decided to text me some inappropriate things. For example “ send me some nudes I’ll pay you through pay pal “ I felt very uncomfortable by this situation. So I wanted to let everyone know DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! 
  Sincerely,
   Trumps daughter
attributes.title: Don’t download this app

attributes.review: first off i open the app and i see the orange mans nude pictures which is an atrocity to see. next i look around and i see pictures of rats all over the page and i was in shock i was almost in tears honey and it had a white refrigerator i was like ugh ou not a white refrigerator ou girl please put your shoes on legs go find you a home🤨
attributes.title: THE WORST APP POSSIBLE!!!!!😾

attributes.review: Why dies this app take so long to download it took 5 hours to download and then it asked me for my phone number and I am not ok with giving my personal information to something that doesn’t need it. It also knows my location, WHY. Is someone going to stalk me or something I need answers!
attributes.title: Worst app ever
